text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Tea with sugar combines the antioxidant effects of
polyphenols and the energy of sugar— truly the ideal 
energy drink...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Ideally, I’d like to raise the sugar content a 
little more to enjoy the taste... but hmph, it seems 
this is the limit of solubility.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
It can’t be helped, I’ll settle for the usual 
taste... no, I shouldn’t let my thoughts be bound by 
existing solubility!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Then I shall explore it—the unknown possibilities! 
Surpassing the limits of solubility—to the ultimate 
sweetness!
